compliant.section: 本網站採用Google Analytics，這是由 Google, Inc. (“Google”) 提供的網站分析服務，Google Analytics使用cookies分析網站造訪者如何使用該網站。為了評估您對網站的使用，Google 將會運用cookies分析您網站活動瀏覽歷程並提供給網站營運者，供其分析並改善網站的介面操作及流程設計。
compliant.legal provisions: Data Controller must inform users about the recipients or categories of recipients of the personal data. This includes disclosing third-party data processors like Google Analytics.

compliant.section: 亦即本網站會通過cookies蒐集您的個人資訊，以提供更個人化的服務。
compliant.legal provisions: Data Controller must inform users about the purposes of the processing for which the personal data are intended as well as the legal basis for the processing.

compliant.section: 如您不同意儲存或處理cookies，您必須在瀏覽器做適當設定來避免安裝cookies。
compliant.legal provisions: Consent to cookies must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous. Users must have an option to refuse cookies and still access basic website functionality.

compliant.section: 和碩了解以負責任的態度使用所蒐集個人資訊的重要性。和碩謹此提醒您，就您提供予和碩的個人資訊，您有權利請求查詢、閱覽、要求提供複本、補充或更正、要求停止蒐集、處理、使用或刪除之。
compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to access, rectify, erase, and restrict processing of their personal data.

non_compliant.section: 它無法作為執行程式碼或傳播病毒。您可從www.allaboutcookies.org 這個網站獲取各類型 cookies的資訊，惟本公司與該網站無涉。
non_compliant.legal provisions: While this information is generally good practice, it is not a legal requirement under GDPR.

non_compliant.section: 另外，如果您被導向其他網站，和碩對其他網站以及其他網站使用cCookies來蒐集您的個人資料的行為不承擔任何責任。
non_compliant.legal provisions: GDPR emphasizes joint controllership. If 和碩 has no influence over data processing on third-party websites, this should be explicitly stated. Otherwise, they might be considered a joint controller and bear responsibility.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the nature of the relationship and data processing responsibilities with any third-party websites linked to.

non_compliant.section: 如果您對本隱私政策有任何疑問或疑慮，或欲行使上述權利，請透過電郵聯繫和碩：rep_admin@pegatroncorp.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects should have various means to contact the controller, including a postal address. Only providing an email might not be sufficient for all data subjects.
